title: Israel Bets Travel Restrictions Will Buy It Time to Fight Omicron
sub_head: Government is urging Israelis to get their booster shots before the new variant spreads
body:
TEL AVIVâ€”As the Omicron variant spreads quickly across the world, Israel has leaned more heavily than other countries on shutting down its borders to international travel, wagering it would slow down a coming wave of infections and buy time to prepare.
So far, Israel has closed its borders to foreigners and has also banned its residents from traveling to dozens of countries, including the U.S. and Canada, the U.K., much of Europe and most of Africa.
